sentences.english: Steams the glutinous food, ten fragrant four overflow.

sentences.english: Among them steaming and stir-fryingare more commonly applied to preserve the natural flavor.

sentences.english: I smelt something burnt before I remembered I had steamed a pudding.

sentences.english: The steamer of slag, steamed back after the cool, and drunk young music into the cellar for discharge distilled grains.

sentences.english: It's steamed and served with our special sauce.

sentences.english: After the sweat coated skin care products, steam, sweat will also be taken away, but not without effect.

sentences.english: Chinese normally steam or fry their foods, not bake them.

sentences.english: They can also be steamed and served on watercress with a plum sauce.
sentences.chinese: 它们也可以蒸，和着西洋菜拌上苏梅酱一起食用。

sentences.english: Tom: Well, it all looks so good. How about ordering the steamed prawns?

sentences.english: The paper introduced a particular pneumatic control circuit to open and close the boiler lid.

sentences.english: Steamed vegetables and tofu with sauce on the side and steamed dumplings from a Chinese restaurant.

sentences.english: Steamed egg with tiny little decorations of peas, corn and Chinese sausage.
